Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
Good grief. There's nothing to see around here!

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
This town doesn't sell much, but sometimes you
can find what you need.

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
I found something really nice. Glad I came here!

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
Man, I bought all kinds of great stuff here!

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
You're here to shop too? ...Oh, you live around
here, huh?

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
This costs HOW much? Come on, let's be
reasonable...

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
Bet it gets pretty lonely around here, huh?

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
This town's still pretty small, but it seems like
it's gotten a little livelier.

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
Wow, when did this town get so huge?

<NAME_MOB_ANTONY>
How did the town get this gigantic...?
